task.name: alignbyvel
task.shortdescription: regrid an image to match a template image in velocity
task.description: Alignbyvel regrids the input image to match the astrometry and velocity axis of a template image allowing for differences in rest frequency.

param.name: overwrite
param.description: Overwrite the output image if it exists?

task.example:
alignbyvel: align one cube to the velocity axis of another.
The new coordinate system is drawn from the template image.
Keyword arguments: infile -- template -- outfile -- async -- Run task in a separate process (return CASA prompt) default: False; example: async=True
